doc:
Denis Lavant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denis_Lavant 0 Denis Lavant (born 17 June 1961) is a French actor known for his distinctive face and the physically demanding aspects of the roles he plays, which often involve slapstick, acrobatics or dance, as well as for his long-standing association with director Leos Carax. Lavant has played the lead role in all but one of Carax's films. Lavant is also known for his roles in Claire Denis' Beau Travail, and Harmony Korine's Mister Lonely. Denis_Lavant ( born 17_June_1961 ) is a_French_actor known for his_distinctive_face and the_physically_demanding_aspects of the_roles he plays , which often involve slapstick_,_acrobatics_or_dance , as_well_as for his_long-standing_association with director_Leos_Carax . Lavant has_played the_lead_role in all but one of Carax 's_films . Lavant is_also_known for his_roles in Claire_Denis '_Beau_Travail , and Harmony_Korine 's_Mister_Lonely .
